REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f0065 reute r f BC-HYDRO-QUEBEC-ISSUES-C 03-12 0073

TEXT.TITLE: HYDRO QUEBEC ISSUES CANADIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: Hydro Quebec is issuing a 125 mln Canadian dlr bond due April 21, 1997 paying nine pct and priced at 100-3/4 pct, lead manager Merrill Lynch International said. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 5,000 dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. Fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession and 3/8 pct each for management and underwriting. Pay date is April 21. REUTER
